#Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
library(rgdal)
library(leaflet)
```


#Data
```{r}
waarnemingen <- read.csv("./dashboard/input/spatial/waarnemingen_2018.csv",
                         header = TRUE,
                         sep = ";",
                         dec = ",")

waarnemingen <- na.omit(waarnemingen) 
```


#Map
```{r}
crs_lambert <- CRS("+init=epsg:31370") 
crs_wgs84 <- CRS("+init=epsg:4326")
 
lonlat <- waarnemingen %>%
  select(x, y)

pts <- SpatialPoints(lonlat, proj4string = crs_lambert)

pts_wgs <- spTransform(pts, crs_wgs84)

map <-leaflet() %>%  
    addTiles() %>%
    addCircles(data = pts_wgs)

map
```
